location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3157 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of a previous letter, concerning the plunder of cargo from a shipwrecked vessel by subjects of the Shaikh of Bahrain. Anderson writes that the Government approves of proceedings and awaits further reports.
